abstract: Scott Thompson, the new chief executive, will get stock grants worth about $22.5 million, atop a $1 million annual salary.
lead_paragraph: Scott Thompson, an Internet pioneer, disclosed in a regulatory filing late on Friday how much money he stands to receive when he begins working for Yahoo on Monday or soon thereafter. It's a package with a hefty amount of stock grants worth about $22.5 million, atop a $1 million annual salary. Read the post on DealBook »
